full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I RIM GNYIS KYI RNAM BZHAG BSHAD GSANG CHEN BDE LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I LAM RIM PA GNYIS KYI RNAM BZHAG BSHAD PA GSANG CHEN BDE LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RIG GNAS MDO SNGAGS MTHA' DAG LA NANG BYANG TSUD PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO YONGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DZA YA PAndI TAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GYIS ZHES BKA' NAN CHEN POS BSKUL ZHING, GSO RIG DANG NANG RIG GNYIS KA LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS PA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA AER DHE NI NO MIN HAN NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS KYANG BSKUL BA LTAR SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS, MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHEYN PA DANG, RJE BLO GROS CHOS SKYONG YAB SRAS GNYIS KYIS SNGA RTING DU MDZAD PA'I 'JIGS BYED KYI SKYED RDZOGS CHEN MO DANG, PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I LEGS BSHAD SOGS GZHI BYAS TE, MTSO BDUN GYI LHA KHANG CHEN MOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GSUNG RAB KYI DON LA RNAM DBYOD YANGS PA'I BKA' BCU NGAG DBANG CHOS LDAN GYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN,
